title: Courtyard by Marriott Gurgaon Appoints Vikram Singh Chauhan as the New Front Office Manager
text:
Saturday, August 29, 2015 10:00AM IST (4:30AM GMT) Courtyard by Marriott Gurgaon Appoints Vikram Singh Chauhan as the New Front Office Manager New Delhi, Delhi, India 
Courtyard by Marriott Gurgaon is pleased to announce the appointment of Vikram Singh Chauhan as the new Front Office Manager for the hotel. Vikram will be responsible for daily operations of the front office team and closely monitoring room inventory to ensure maximum profitability.“I am delighted to have this opportunity to join Courtyard by Marriott, Gurgaon as the Front Office Manager and continue my long standing association with the Marriott group,” says Vikram Singh Chauhan. He joins Courtyard by Marriott Gurgaon from Hyderabad Marriott Hotel & Convention Centre and Courtyard by Marriott Hyderabad where he was the Assistant Front Office Manager. Commenting on the appointment, Kanika Hasrat, General Manager stated, “Vikram Singh Chauhan comes with rich experience in the operations department and has been successfully driving the rooms upsell revenue and guest delight in his previous role at Courtyard by Marriott Hyderabad and Hyderabad Marriott Hotel & Convention Centre. Vikram’s expertise and experience will further strengthen our Front Office division.” Vikram Singh Chauhan holds a degree in Hotel Management from Institute of Hotel Management, (Jaipur, Rajasthan) and has worked with hotels like Courtyard by Marriott, Hyderabad, Renaissance Mumbai Convention Centre Hotel & Marriott Executive Apartments, Taj Lake Palace (Udaipur, Rajasthan), The Taj Falaknuma Palace Hyderabad, The Oberoi Udai Vilas (Udaipur, Rajasthan) Taj Umaid Bhawan Palace, (Jodhpur, Rajasthan) and The Park Hyderabad. Having led and implemented innovative procedures for enhancing Guest Satisfaction, Arrival Experience and having achieved 100% in Brand Standard Audits at Marriott Hyderabad & Courtyard by Marriott, Hyderabad for Year 2015 & 2014 and Renaissance Mumbai Convention Centre for the Year 2012, Vikram Singh Chauhan matches the dynamism of Marriott. With his thorough knowledge and expertise of the front office operations, he is will bring immense value to Courtyard by Marriott Gurgaon’s already strong Guest recognition and service culture. About Marriott International Marriott International, Inc . (NASDAQ: MAR) is a global leading lodging company based in Bethesda, Maryland, USA, with more than 4,200 properties in 80 countries and territories. Marriott International reported revenues of nearly $14 billion in fiscal year 2014. The company operates and franchises hotels and licenses vacation ownership resorts under 19 brands.
